name: KARLSON: Rehydrated
description:
Since you guys aren't real gamers (like me) and you keep complaining, here's the controls:
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Aim
Click - Shoot
R - Reload
1 - Pistol
E - Katana

The KARLSON top-down shooter series continues with KARLSON: Rehydrated! Karlson like to drink milk and absolutely rip robots apart until there's nothing left, and he's all out of milk.
